definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: Many people who lost their jobs during the Great Depression had to do whatever they could.
sentences.chinese: 許多人在大蕭條中失去工作，迫於生計，無所不爲。

sentences.english: Antinori's determination to clone threatens his current livelihood.
sentences.chinese: 安蒂諾里堅持克隆人的決心已危及到他目前的生計。

sentences.english: The drought also posed a threat to the immediate future of thousands of smallholder farmers.
sentences.chinese: 乾旱還威脅着成千上萬小農近期的生計。

sentences.english: Overnight, they were forcibly deprived of their living.
sentences.chinese: 一夜之間，他們的生計被強制剝奪了。

sentences.english: We aim at the assurance of a rounded, a permanent national life.
sentences.chinese: 我們務使國民生計獲得全面和長久的保證。

sentences.english: Do you think he can or should be further on top career-wise?
sentences.chinese: 還是你以爲他應當在任業生活生計上再進一步？

sentences.english: He learned from folk artists and sculptors how to make a living.
sentences.chinese: 生活貧困，爲了生計，他向民間畫工和雕匠學習。

sentences.english: Female domestic workers usually seek work abroad out of desperation .
sentences.chinese: 女性家庭幫傭往往因生計困難而出國找工作。

sentences.english: An interest in child rights, education, health, gender, livelihoods is appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 對兒童權利，教育，健康，性別，生計感興趣者爲佳。

sentences.english: Most of marketing people persuade non-necessary needs of the people for their living.
sentences.chinese: 大多的銷售爲了他們的生計向別人推銷不需要的東西。

sentences.english: There's not al a rge enough base of workers to support them.
sentences.chinese: 現在的工人的基數不夠大，不足以維持他們的生計。

sentences.english: One night I had a nightmare, running whole night for unobtainable thing. I made a decision when I was awoken.
sentences.chinese: 前夜作了一個奔波生計的夢，醒來後暗暗地決定。

sentences.english: What do you do for a living?
Our toil, resources, and livelihood are all involved.
sentences.chinese: 我們的辛勞，資源和生計全部生計都命懸於此。

sentences.english: Our toil, resources, and livelihood are all involved.
sentences.chinese: 我們的辛勞，資源和生計全部生計都命懸於此。

sentences.english: We have to form longer-term plans for helping people to recover .
sentences.chinese: 我們必須制定幫助人們恢復生計的長期計劃。

definition: to seek one's livelihood/to work to support oneself/to earn a living
to have enough food and warm clothes/adequately provided
for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
to live one's life/to make a living
